options.text: <color=#AE49FF>Worm</color>: This is it… the final village. Stay strong, hero.

Beyond these ruins lies the throne of the <color=#AE49FF>Demon King</color>—the source of all our suffering. His power poisons the land, and he will not fall easily.

Use your gems wisely to buy the abilities you truely need.

And remember: the <color=#AE49FF>Demon King</color> is bound by an ancient spell. He is <color=#AE49FF>invincible</color> until you gather the three <color=#AE49FF>Mysterious Gems</color>. Only then will his shield break… and your final battle truly begin.

Go, brave soul. End this darkness.
